patthana22.12:4.1: Nakusalaṃ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:4.2: Naakusalaṃ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:4.3: Naabyākataṃ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:4.5: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.12:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:5.2: Nakusalaṃ naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.12:5.5: Hetuyā cha … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
